mapper.select: SELECT dongCode, sidoName FROM dongcode WHERE dongCode LIKE "__00000000" ORDER BY dongCode
SELECT dongCode, gugunName FROM dongcode WHERE dongCode LIKE CONCAT(#{sidoCode}, "___00000") AND gugunName IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dongCode
SELECT dongCode, dongName FROM dongcode WHERE dongCode LIKE CONCAT(#{gugunCode}, "_____") AND dongName IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dongCode

SELECT i.aptCode, i.dongCode, i.buildYear, i.apartmentName, CONCAT(dc.sidoName, ' ', dc.gugunName, ' ', dc.dongName, ' ') AS address, TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM i.bonbun) AS bonbun , TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM i.bubun) AS bubun, MAX(d.dealAmount) AS dealAmount, MAX(d.dealYear) AS dealYear, MAX(d.area) AS area, i.lng, i.lat FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i, dongcode dc WHERE d.aptCode = i.aptCode AND i.dongCode = #{dongCode} AND i.dongCode = dc.dongCode GROUP BY i.aptCode ORDER BY aptCode

SELECT i.aptCode, i.dongCode, i.apartmentName, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, i.lng, i.lat, d.no FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.aptCode = i.aptCode AND i.aptCode = #{aptCode} ORDER BY dealYear DESC, dealMonth DESC, dealDay DESC, no DESC
SELECT a.dongCode, a.user_id, d.sidoName, d.gugunName, d.dongName FROM areainterest a, dongcode d WHERE a.dongcode = d.dongcode AND a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM areainterest WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dongcode = #{code}
DELETE FROM housedeal WHERE no LIKE #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT d.dealAmount FROM housedeal d, houseinfo i WHERE d.aptCode = i.aptCode AND dongCode = #{code};
